birth_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省桐城县
birth_place.en: Tongcheng County, Anhui Province, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，曾任第十三届全国人民代表大会河北地区代表。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, and a former deputy for the Hebei region to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省下的一个县，是黄立军的出生地。
description.en: A county under Anhui Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Huang Lijun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会
第十三届全国人大代表

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The 13th national legislature of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 黄立军出生于安徽省桐城县。
description.en: Huang Lijun was born in Tongcheng County, Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 黄立军是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Huang Lijun is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年2月24日，黄立军当选为第十三届全国人民代表大会河北地区代表。
description.en: On February 24, 2018, Huang Lijun was elected as a deputy from the Hebei region to the 13th National People's Congress.
